scripts.lint: eslint --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern test src actions scripts lib web-src e2e jest.config.js jest.setup.js
scripts.lint:check: eslint --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --max-warnings 0 test src actions scripts lib web-src e2e jest.config.js jest.setup.js
scripts.format: prettier --write --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern test src actions scripts lib web-src e2e jest.config.js jest.setup.js .eslintrc.json *.md docs/*.md
scripts.format:check: prettier --check --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern test src actions scripts lib web-src e2e jest.config.js jest.setup.js .eslintrc.json *.md docs/*.md
scripts.dev:reset: npm run dev:clean && npm run prepare
scripts.dev:fresh: npm run dev:reset && npm run lint:fix && npm run format
scripts.dev:validate: npm run lint:check && npm run format:check && npm run type-check && npm run test:ci && npm run security:audit
